us.title: About Us
us.whyText: At Builco, we don't just provide consulting: we become strategic partners. We combine vision, multisectoral experience, and innovation to offer comprehensive solutions that create real value. We support our clients with a 360Â° approach, designing and implementing sustainable and effective strategies that drive their growth. Where others see problems, we see opportunities for transformation.

who.title: Strategic Partners
who.desc: Builco drives business growth in Colombia and LATAM.

who.title: BIC Company
who.desc: Committed to social and environmental impact.

who.title: Multidisciplinary Team
who.desc: Experts in various sectors and markets.

us.finalText: Building bridges, driving the future, and creating new connections to elevate the mission of our clients and partners.

values.title: Relationships before transactions
values.desc: We build lasting and meaningful bonds, prioritizing mutual value over immediate gain.

values.title: We grow so others can grow
values.desc: Our success is measured by the positive impact and growth we generate for our clients and partners.

values.title: Authenticity as a principle
values.desc: We operate with transparency and honesty, staying true to our values and who we are.

values.title: Courage to reinvent
values.desc: We embrace change and challenge the status quo, seeking new and better ways to do things.

values.title: Beta Culture
values.desc: We are in constant learning and evolution, always open to testing, adapting, and improving our processes.

values.title: Innovate and create impact
values.desc: We seek creative and disruptive solutions that leave a positive and lasting mark on society.

values.title: Responsibility for tomorrow
values.desc: We act with future generations in mind, committing to sustainable and ethical practices.

welcome.desc: Your trusted platform connecting gold miners and buyers across Colombia

registration.desc: It will only take a few minutes
registration.title: Sign in with
registration.privacy: I have read the privacy policy
registration.validationDesc: Soon you will receive an email once we validate your account.

productor.title: Gold Producer
productor.desc: Quote and publish minerals for free, connecting directly with buyers and suppliers in Latin America through the 'Match' system.

comercializador.title: Minerals/Mining Trader
comercializador.desc: Acquire minerals directly from reliable miners, publish purchase offers or mines for sale/investment, with notifications from the 'Match' system.

proveedor.title: Products & Services Provider for the Mining Industry
proveedor.desc: Maximize your business and expand your reach by connecting with millions of miners in Latin America through this specialized ecosystem.

hero.title: Building Strategic Connections
hero.subtitle: We empower purpose-driven companies through innovative, sustainable, and collaborative solutions. We connect talent, technology, and strategic vision to turn challenges into opportunities and make our partners industry leaders.

feature1.title: Impact Representation
feature1.description: We help organizations expand in Latin America and the US, connecting them with strategic partners and opportunities to accelerate their impact.

feature2.title: 360 Consulting
feature2.description: We offer comprehensive consulting (from strategy to execution, including legal and data intelligence) to generate real and measurable economic, social, and environmental impact.

feature3.title: Government and Governance.
feature3.description: Support in the process of legislative initiatives. From creation to enactment.

workWithUs.title: Let's Work Together
workWithUs.subtitle: Ready to boost your impact? Explore new markets, forge strategic alliances, and transform your practices. Connect with Builco today.

companyDescription: Drive sustainable growth through business representation with a clear purpose and market development.
